title: I was Reincarnated in an Otome Game!! ～Easy Mode, I’ll Enjoy It!! - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Female Protagonist   Mob Protagonist   Oneshot   Otome Game   Reincarnated in a Game World
author: ニコル
description:
The popular otome game app 'Labyrinth with My Dear Boyfriend'.
When I reincarnated, I was reincarnated into one of the villainess' henchmen!
Reincarnated as Frenica Schwertz, I attended a party hosted by the Royal Family and the Duke of Almaden.
I will absolutely not get involved with the characters!
But the person who stood in front of Frenica who decided so is perhaps the villainess?!>
